amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for salaries and expenses of DEA by $9 million and redirects $2 million to deficit reduction, $3 million to the Victims of Child Abuse Act, and $4 million to the Consolidated Youth Oriented program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the DEA salaries and expenses account by $9 million and increase the Office on Violence Against Women account by $4 million and increase the Juvenile Justice Programs by $3 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lieu, Ted amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Lieu, Ted.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lieu, Ted amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Lieu, Ted.
